issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement new cache eviction policy in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12986](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12986). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Actually, the eviction policy algorithm used by Gandiva's cache is based on LRU.

I suggest to add a new option of eviction algorithm to use that considers the LLVM build time as a cost, and evicts the elements based on the GrredyDual-Size algorithm.
